name: Metania
description:
The story follows John, a young man struggling with Mental Illness
who is tormented by visions, voices, and an inability to remember the past.
He is determined to uncover the mysterious circumstances of his family's disappearance.
With only his own unsettled thoughts as his guide.
John embarks on a journey through all distinct Levels in order to unravel this mystery.
Each stage is filled with locked doors, puzzles,
and cryptic notes that must be solved to progress, as each step brings him closer to the truth.
Along the way, John must come to terms with his reality,
and accept his role in his family's disappearance, revealing a tragedy much more devastating than he could have ever imagined.
